<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reliable Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=5566) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Cat's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=5544)

</column>

---

You survive danger with surprising regularity. You can use Cat's Luck once per hour, rather than once per day.
name: Reliable Luck
